name: Clearer Chinese Sites Mod by Colt
description: Mod based on Clearer Chinese Sites - w/ MS JhengHei/YaHei Fonts Sep 4, 2009 (https://userstyles.org/styles/18810/clearer-chinese-sites-w-ms-jhenghei-yahei-fonts). Add some of my favorite sites.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
/* Written by Danny Siu <danny.siu at gmail dot com> */
/* http://dsiu.org/ */
/* Modified by Colt */

/* Traditional Chinese Sites */
@-moz-document 
domain("hk"),
domain("tw"),
domain("discuss.com.hk"),
domain("facekoo.com"),
domain("google.com.hk"),
domain("google.com.tw"),
domain("ithome.com.tw"),
domain("on.cc"),
domain("mobile01.com"),
domain("uwants.com"),
domain("hk.myblog.yahoo.com"),
domain("hk.news.yahoo.com"),
domain("hk.yahoo.com"),
domain("tw.yahoo.com"),
domain("tw.news.yahoo.com"),
domain("udn.com")
{
* { font-family: "Microsoft JhengHei",sans-serif !important; } /* "文泉驿微米黑" */
}
 
/* Simplified Chinese Sites */
@-moz-document 
url("about:home"),
domain("cn"),
domain("163.com"),
domain("265.com"),
domain("21cn.com"),
domain("91.com"),
domain("92wy.com"),
domain("baidu.com"),
domain("blogbus.com"),
domain("chinahr.com"),
domain("chinaren.com"),
domain("cnbeta.com"),
domain("cngba.com"),
domain("csdn.com"),
domain("csdn.net"),
domain("douban.com"),
domain("fanfou.com"),
domain("google.com.hk"),
domain("google.com"),
domain("huanqiu.com"),
domain("hudong.com"),
domain("infoq.com"),
domain("infzm.com"),
domain("it168.com"),
domain("itpub.net"),
domain("kaixin.com"),
domain("kaixin001.com"),
domain("mop.com"),
domain("netease.com"),
domain("oschina.net"),
domain("people.com.cn"),
domain("qq.com"),
domain("renren.com"),
domain("sina.com"),
domain("sina.com.cn"),
domain("sohu.com"),
domain("sogou.com"),
domain("soso.com"),
domain("taobao.com"),
domain("tgbus.com"),
domain("tianya.cn"),
domain("tianya.com"),
domain("tom.com"),
domain("cn.yahoo.com"),
domain("youku.com"),
domain("renren.com"),
domain("ycool.com"),
domain("zaobao.com"),
domain("zol.com.cn"),
domain("zh.wikipedia.org")
{
* { font-family: "Microsoft Yahei",sans-serif !important; } /* "文泉驿微米黑" */
}
